title: Los Olivos
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean, Middle Eastern, Puerto Rican, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Caribbean and Lebanese/Mediterranean cuisine with veggie choices such as babaganoush, hummus, dolmas, falafel, and tabbouleh; local dishes such as vegetable mofongos (vegan) and piononos. On Thursdays it offers a fixed price vegetarian meal for two including 2 of each sangria, vegan soup, veg main dish, and dessert; off-menu ordering is also possible for vegetarians and vegan guests during certain hours.
streetAddress: Centro de Bellas Artes de Caguas, Calle Padial
